entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY, Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:38 p.m. EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.3°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 60 early this evening then becoming light overnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
